vulnerability.name: USN-7494-3
vulnerability.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - Network drivers;   - Netfilter; (CVE-2023-52664, CVE-2023-52927)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in the Linux kernel.
